title: 10-Day Adventure in Kerala
author: Alex Doe
summary: Embark on an unforgettable 10-day journey through the lush backwaters, tea plantations, and pristine beaches of Kerala. This itinerary is packed with adventure, from exploring the hill stations of Munnar to cruising through the backwaters of Alleppey. Perfect for nature lovers and culture enthusiasts alike.

activities.title: Arrival and Check-in
activities.description: Arrive at Cochin International Airport. Pick up rental car and drive to Hotel Aveda. Check in and relax after your flight.

activities.title: Evening Stroll & Dinner
activities.description: Explore the historic Fort Kochi area. Enjoy a traditional Kerala dinner at a local restaurant.

activities.title: Houseboat Experience
activities.description: Board a traditional Kerala houseboat and cruise through the serene backwaters. Enjoy authentic Kerala cuisine on board.

activities.title: Tea Plantation Tour
activities.description: Visit the famous tea plantations of Munnar. Learn about tea processing and enjoy scenic views.
